summary: Calico privilege escalation vulnerability in github.com/projectcalico/calico
details:
Calico privilege escalation vulnerability in github.com/projectcalico/calico.

NOTE: The source advisory for this report contains additional versions that could not be automatically mapped to standard Go module versions.

(If this is causing false-positive reports from vulnerability scanners, please suggest an edit to the report.)

The additional affected modules and versions are: github.com/projectcalico/calico/v3 before v3.26.5, from v3.27.0 before v3.27.3.
